p: The study period covered the epidemic waves that occurred in the years 2015 and 2016. For Zika fever, the first wave comprised epidemiological weeks (EW) 15/2015 to 52/2015, and for Chikungunya and Dengue fever, the first wave comprised the EWs from 01/2015 to 52/2015. For the three arboviruses, we considered the second wave comprised the EWs from 01/2016 to 52/2016.
